item.title: Business Review Automation
item.description: Getting Consistent Five Star Reviews For Your Business It's getting harder to compete in today's marketplace. One bad review amidst just a handful of total reviews can spell disaster for your business.

item.title: SMS Payment Reminders
item.description: It's hard to keep track of all the payments that need to made. It's even more difficult to track the payments that haven't been made by a business. From lawyers to accountants, the need to collect payments on a timely business is crucial to keeping the lights on and making sure that payroll is met.
